actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of April 16, 1980 (H. Doc, 96-299) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds, pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, specified levels of budget authority proposed by the President on April 16, 1980 (H. Doc. 96-299) as follows: (1) within the Department of Agriculture for the Science and Education Administration, the Farmers Home Administration, and the Soil Conservation Service; (2) within the Department of Commerce for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration; (3) within the Department of Energy for atomic energy defense activities, energy supply, research, and development activities, uranium supply and enrichment activities, fossil energy research and development, energy conservation, the Economic Regulatory Administration, and departmental activities; (4) within the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare (now the Department of Health and Human Services) for the Health Services Administration, the National Institutes of Health, the Alcohol, Drug Abuse, and Mental Health Administration, the Health Resources Administration, the Office of the Assistant Secretary for Health, and the Office of Education (now the Department of Education); (5) within the Department of Housing and Urban Development for community planning and development grants and loans; (6) within the Department of the Interior for the Heritage Conservation and Recreation Service; (7) within the Department of the Treasury for the Bureau of Government Financial Operations; (8) for the activities of the Arms Control and Disarmament Agency; (9) for the salaries and expenses of the Federal Mine Safety and Health Review Commission; (10) within the Merit Systems Protection Board for the Office of the Special Counsel; (11) within the National Science Foundation for science education activities; (12) for salaries and expenses of the Occupational Safety and Health Review Commission; (13) within the Small Business Administration for the Business Loan and Investment Fund; and (14) within the Water Resources Council for water resources planning.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of April 16, 1980 (H. Doc, 96-299) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
